name: Blocks Blocks Blocks
description:
Use a combination of movement and aiming skills to reach your objectives high above you.

Video Link:


WASD for movement. 

Doubletap WASD for dodging.

SpaceBar for Jump, and Double Jump.

DoubleTap WASD while against a wall for wall dodging.

Left Mouse Button for Firing.

Right Mouse Button for Freezing.

Middle Mouse Button for Thawing.

C for crouching, staying on narrow ledges.
